## Validated type

Validate a module: return T if valid, error message if not

**Signature:**

```typescript
type Validated<T> = IsInvalid<T> extends true ? ErrorFor<T> : T;
```
**References:** [IsInvalid](../isinvalid/)<!-- -->, [ErrorFor](../errorfor/)
